description:
Over 470 men signed up for the UberMan Challenge in the first week! Do you want to become a happier, healthier, more confident and more masculine man? Have you ever felt at odds with your masculinity? Insecure? Unfulfilled ? Unprepared to handle yourself when sh*t hits the fan? That is all about to change...

The 30 Day UberMan challenge has been tested and proven by the men of MANSA (Man Skills Academy), to rapidly increase your confidence and competence as a man. Over the next 30 Days, you will undergo a total transformation and experience massive personal growth.

Not only will you develop new "man skills", but you will build life changing habits and gain virtues that will make you a new and improved version of the man that you are today.

Here are some of the AWESOME things you will know how to do by the end of this course:

  1. Speak louder, clearer and with more confidence
  2. Project strong, alpha body language that attracts woman and will command the respect of your friends, family, co-workers and peers
  3. Defend yourself from aggressors and learn how to protect your loved ones
  4. Safely operate and shoot a handgun. You will be zombie apocalypse ready!
  5. Dazzle your nephews, nieces, friends, bar-babes and just about anyone with one easy but amazing magic trick
  6. Get better at telling stories and imparting wisdom through anecdotes
  7. Tell a funny joke that will make your friends laugh so hard that they piss their pants
  8. Have a new appreciation for your life, gratitude and a winning attitude that will set you up for success
  9. No longer let fear rule your life. "Feel the fear and do it anyways"
  10. Live 6.5 years longer with one easy life hack
  11. Perform CPR and know what to do when a loved one is choking
  12. Get what you want in life by becoming a master-negotiator
  13. Give a woman an orgasm... EVERY TIME
  14. Unsnap a bra with one-hand
  15. Read minds with a jaw-dropping Jedi-Mind Trick (cold-reading)
  16. Be bold, unafraid and have more in control over your life than ever before
  17. MAKE 2015 the best year of your life

You will learn all of the skills above and much more in JUST 30 DAYS. This course is packed with bonuses and I am going to continue to make it better based on your feedback.

Upon graduating you will get the first of the Man Skills Academy-Man Cards, your MC 1.

Warning: This course requires you to take action. If you just want to listen to a few videos for a quick feel good session, the 30 Day UberMan Challenge is not for you.

If you want an arsenal of proven tips, strategies and exercises that you can use to earn your manhood and immediately improve your life, than sign up now.

Welcome to the 30 Day UberMan Challenge.

See you inside.
title: Increase Your Confidence - 30 Day UberMan Challenge
